title.rendered: Official University of the Witwatersrand Prospectus 2025 – Download Now

content.rendered:
The University of the Witwatersrand consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and course information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • School fees/tuition
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • University of the Witwatersrand admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at the University of the Witwatersrand based on the information provided within it.

Note: The University of the Witwatersrand’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives more detailed information about your application.

University of the Witwatersrand Prospectus 2025

The University of the Witwatersrand   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.wits.ac.za/

University of the Witwatersrand PROSPECTUS 2025 – PDF DOWNLOAD
